author: SND\lagdeppa_cp
msg: fixed by a.) Failing the maven-embedder-plugin if it can't connect to http://localhost:8080/dotnet-service-embedder/; b.) changing the exit of the  batch file from 'exit /B 0' to 'cmd /C exit /B 0' so that System.Diagnostics.Process can pick it up; and c.) by outputing the proper message when trying to launch the NMaven Build System VS Plugin ( whether it failed or succeeded )
